chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer wants a REPLACEMENT.

Customer could not turn off the camera sound, we also communicated some remote solutions but not successful.



Regards,
Sema from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and we will await for the arrival of the parcel. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

You have received the product for exchange the 06/06/2024. 

The delay to exchange the product is 3 working days for any other type of device. 

Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 11/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
